name: [REPOWER]
description:
Simple but challenging puzzle game that uses grappling hook and power mechanics.

Download for best experience.

Controls (can be seen in game):

W, A, S, D - move

Arrow keys - grappling hook

Z - undo

R - restart

esc - return to menu

Credits:

Music by SpiderDave https://opengameart.org/users/spiderdave
